name: Festive Fervor
desc: The festive fervor of the Sabzeruz Festival can be continually accumulated by participating in festival events and be used to unlock various rewards.

value.text: Version 5.1 Event - Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses

customize.desc: The festive fervor of the Sabzeruz Festival can be continually accumulated by participating in festival events and be used to unlock various rewards.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Philosophies of Admonition
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.

Admonition is completed by good deeds. What is done confers real meaning upon what is said. When one's mind, words, and deeds are aligned, their nourishment shall guarantee the fruition of wisdom's tree.

customize.name: Mora

customize.name: Philosophies of Ingenuity
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.

Ingenuity is completed by harmonious conduct. What is done completes what is thought.

Wisdom blooms where the mind, words, and practice converge.

customize.name: Philosophies of Praxis
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.

Praxes bring forth the fruit of wisdom. Practice grants itself meaning, and it is only by treading a path that unites actions, speech, and thought that the wise may reach perfection.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.
